original_title: He estado pensando en los pájaros
overview: I've been thinking about the birds. I've been thinking about the neighbors' windows. I've been thinking about cinema. I've been thinking about rain and snow. I've been thinking about you. I've been thinking about what you don't see. I've been thinking about aliens. I've been thinking about what's going to happen to us.
title: He estado pensando en los pájaros
